name: Ensure buckets have versioning enabled
body: Cyscale looks for buckets that do not have versioning enabled. Versioning is a means of keeping multiple variants of an object. With versioning you can recover more easily from both unintended user actions and application failures.
remediationDescription:
Depending on the provider and service that you use, check out the following resources:

#### AWS
* [Enabling versioning on buckets](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/manage-versioning-examples.html)

#### Azure
* [Enable and manage blob versioning](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/blobs/versioning-enable?tabs=portal)

#### Google Cloud
* [Use Object Versioning](https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/using-object-versioning#set)

#### Alibaba
* [Enable Versioning to Protect Valuable Data in Alibaba Cloud OSS](https://www.alibabacloud.com/blog/enable-versioning-to-protect-valuable-data-in-alibaba-cloud-oss_597400)
